name: tech-blog
description: ``` * npm init -y * npm install express * npm install mysql2 * npm install sequelize  * npm install dotenv * npm install express-handlebars * npm i express-session connect-session-sequelize * npm i bcrypt * heroku create * git push heroku main * * Use JawsDB in heroku *   In the heroku project, click on the Resources tab,Underneath Add-ons, search for "JawsDB MySQL"
